author: Al Jazeera
title: Germany takes control of Gazprom unit to ensure energy supply - Al Jazeera English
description: Gazprom Germania will come under the trusteeship of the German energy regulator until Sept. 30, Berlin has said.
content:
Germany will temporarily take control of a unit of Gazprom PJSC in the country as it seeks to safeguard security of gas supply.
